Article.ArticleTitle: Coding-complete genome sequence and phylogenetic analysis of Coxsackievirus B3 isolated from South Korea.

Abstract.AbstractText: Whole-genome sequencing of a Coxsackievirus B3 strain isolated from the stool of a febrile patient with aseptic meningoencephalitis, South Korea, in 2002 was performed. This strain exhibits a high nucleotide sequence identity with various strains circulating in China from 2001 to 2019.
